content: The influence of consuming this chai elixir twice a week in moderation on the hallmarks of aging is not well established and cannot be accurately estimated as there is limited scientific research specifically on this specific combination of ingredients. However, some of the bioactive compounds present in the ingredients, such as antioxidants and anti-inflammatory agents, may potentially contribute to a reduction in oxidative stress and inflammation, which are both associated with the aging process. However, more research is needed to confirm these effects and determine the optimal dosage and frequency of consumption.
